segments.content:
A small planet glows in the light of its sun. Suddenly, we

hear a loud rumble, and see a thick, electronic mist behind

the planet... Then, the electronic mist begins to engulf the

planet, and we hear the horrible sounds of destruction.

Almost like somebody, or something, is eating it.

locations: THE NEAR SIDE OF THE PLANET'S SURFACE
heading.raw_text: EXT. THE NEAR SIDE OF THE PLANET'S SURFACE

segments.content:
Strange robotic creatures scramble around the planet in a

wild panic. It looks like Pompeii must have looked as

Vesuvius erupted.

heading.subject: ONE OF THE CREATURES
heading.raw_text: ANGLE ON ONE OF THE CREATURES - TRACKING

segments.content:
The creature is KRANIX. We will meet him later on in a very

different context, but for now, he is running from the ever-

growing mist that threatens to engulf him.
As Kranix runs, another creature, ARBLUS, calls to him.

Transform and flee, Kranix! You must

             warn all you meet of the horror of

             Unicron! Suddenly, the pitiful creature

             is surrounded by the strange energy cloud

             and it looks like his body has

             simultaneously caught fire and been

             doused with acid.
Arblus!   No!

The mist threatens to engulf him too. He transforms into a

small rocket ship and...

He takes off. As we rise higher and higher in the atmosphere,

we see the horror wrought by the hideous and still mysterious

Unicron. The planet cracks like an egg and rivers of lava

leak out. The energy cloud surrounds it and... Dissolves

everything... ... And when the smoke clears, we get our

first look at Unicron. It is horrifying. A massive, metal orb

with a gaping maw and a field of electricity.

PAN FORWARD to SHOW that this hideous planet is on a direct

collision course with...

heading.subject: MOONS ORBITING CYBERTRON IN DEEP SPACE
heading.raw_text: MOONS ORBITING CYBERTRON IN DEEP SPACE

segments.content:
There are TWO MECHANISTIC MOONS orbiting the huge planet

Cybertron. But we are most concerned with a small, greenish

metal one.

It is the year 2005. The treacherous

          Decepticons have conquered the Autobots'

          home planet of Cybertron. But from

          secret staging grounds on two of

          Cybertron's moons the valiant Autobots

          prepare to retake their homeland.

At first, we see nothing unusual or suspicious. Then,

pulling closer, we see that the top of the moon is covered

with moon camouflage "netting" and underneath it is a huge

cache of futuristic weapons. This is the Autobot staging

ground for an assault on Cybertron. DOLLY THROUGH THE COMPLEX

until we arrive at a Command Center where several Autobots

peer into monitors, running constant surveillance on

Cybertron.

He peers into a monitor. As he speaks, we see the monitor

PAN to an area where a huge Decepticon Symbol is emblazoned

on Cybertron.

Every time I look into this thing, my

          circuits sizzle. I'm tired of this

          waiting game, Prime. When are we gonna

          start bustin' Deceptichops?

He stands over a holographic map which shows various invasion

plans for Cybertron.

We still don't have enough Energon cubes

          to power a full scale assault, Ironhide.

Then let me make another run to Autobot

          City on Earth. I'll bring you back more

          cubes than you'll know what to do with.
He solemnly hands down an order
Alright, ready the shuttle for launch.
He raises a fist in a warwhoop!

(looking into monitor)

           Your days are numbered now Decepticreeps.

Ironhide transforms and Races toward a mountain, which stands

about a half mile from the secret Autobot facility.
Jazz,    report security status.

heading.subject: THE CONSOLES
heading.raw_text: COMMAND CENTER - ANGLE ON THE CONSOLES

segments.content:
No sign of Decepticons in this sector,

           Prime.
What about Moon Base 2?

Jazz to Moon Base 2.

PAN UP   and through the sky to -

This is the second moon. It is much

           closer to Cybertron than the first one.

           This is where Bumblebee and Spike are

           stationed.
Jazz to Moon Base 2.

They stand together a communication console. Spike is now

35 years old. Bumblebee looks as he has always looked, save

for a couple of funny bumper stickers on his tail: I (heart)

Cybertron. I (club) Decepticons.
Bumblebee and Spike here.

We're about to send up the bird. Any

              Decepticon shenanigans in your sector?

All clear, Jazz.

                  (pause)

Hey,   Ironhide, tell my son, Daniel, I

              miss   him, and tell him I'll be coming

              home   as soon as we've kicked Megatron's

              tail   across the galaxy.

Ironhide and Prowl sit at the controls, running a series of

pre-launch tests.
Will do, Spike.

heading.subject: PRIME, CLIFFJUMPER, AND THE OTHERS
heading.raw_text: ANGLE ON PRIME, CLIFFJUMPER, AND THE OTHERS

segments.content: Standing at the Command Center, watching:
Commence countdown, Cliffjumper.
Five...Four...Three...Two...
Suddenly, smoke starts pouring out of the mountain.

One....

Then, the "mountain" which must be made of paper mache or

something blows away revealing -- The shuttle!

Liftoff.

Suddenly, the shuttle rips out of the ground in a ball of

fire.

As it takes off, we realize this isn't any dinky shuttle, but

a massive ship, capable of carrying all the energon needed

to fight a war and an army to boot. The screen is bathed in

smoke and fire which slowly clears.
As he watches the shuttle shoot into the distance.

Now, all we need is a little Energon and

             a lot of luck.

We see a bank of computers. Suddenly, a small tape deck pops

open... a cassette pops out and transforms into...

...Laserbeak who flies away unseen.
The shuttle    hurtles though a massive asteroid field.

Slow down, Ironhide. We want to get to

             Autobot city in one piece.
Ironhide is at the controls.

If I can dodge Dececpticon rays, I can

             sure as shootin' dodge a couple of

             asteroids.

Suddenly, there is a terrible BANG! on the side of the ship,

and the two Autobots are thrown from their seats.
You were saying?

That wasn't an asteroid. There is a blast

             of light and they turn to see...

The most powerful laser light anybody has ever seen cuts a

gaping hole in the side of the ship... Then, when the light

clears, a panel of the ship falls in and we see -
In all his glory.

Die Autobots!

Then, he transforms to Gun Mode, spins into STARSCREAM'S arms

and Starscream fires.
is cut in half by Megatron's blast.
as SCAVENGER MELTS HIM DOWN.

...eat away at the hole in the shuttle to

            make way for... ...an ARMY of other

            Decepticons including Laserbeak who

            enter, firing.

While FIRING back are FUSED TOGETHER... ... then blasted

apart and fall in smoking, glowing fragments.

As they enter the now empty ship, a number of Decepticons

flood past them, taking positions and searching for other

living Autobots.
This was almost too easy, Starscream.

Much easier, oh mighty Megatron, than

            attacking the real threat: the Autobots

            moon base.

You're an idiot, Starscream. Were we

            simply to wipe out that minuscule base,

            they could build another one.

But when we slip by their security

          systems in their own ship and destroy

          Autobot city, the Autobots will be

          vanquished forever!

Fat chance, Megatron!

Ironhide pulls himself up and grabs onto Megatron who flings

him against the wall.
Such heroic nonsense!

heading.subject: SHOT- MINIATURE RADAR SCREEN
heading.raw_text: EXT. EARTH - CLOSE SHOT- MINIATURE RADAR SCREEN

segments.content:
A child's hands hold a scanner device which tracks a

TRAVELING BLIP across a star map towards a pulsing dot which

represents the Earth.

The Shuttle just zipped past checkpoint

          zeta.

Daniel, a classic twelve year old

          American boy watches the portable viewer

          which is like an over-sized Boy Scout

heading.subject: N SHOT to show he is at an
heading.raw_text: compass. WIDEN SHOT to show he is at an

segments.content:
old fashioned "fishin' hole" on Earth -

          surrounded by weeping willows, assorted

          trees and shrubs, and that his fishing

          pole is stuck in the dirt, the line

          floating lazily out on the water.

Let's watch Ironhide land it, Hot Rod! As

          Daniel runs to small skateboard-like

          device, hits a button, and watches, it

          transforms into a hoverboard and rides

          it, like a surfer up a steep, grassy

heading.subject: ide we change angle to feature...
heading.raw_text: hillside we change angle to feature...

segments.content:
an "adolescent" Autobot. He is in robot

          mode, sitting with his fishing rod held

          between two fingers, looking bored with

          it all.
Talk about dull......!
Then, he tosses the rod into the water.

heading.subject: ON DANIEL RIDING HIS HOVERBOARD UP THE HILL
heading.raw_text: ON DANIEL RIDING HIS HOVERBOARD UP THE HILL

segments.content:
(calling excitedly)

          Hurry or we'll miss it!
lopes up hill after Daniel.

If you're gonna ride, Dan-O ...ride in

          style! Hot Rod catches up with Daniel,

          scoops him off his hoverboard, TRANSFORMS

          to automotive mode and RIDES OVER CREST

          OF HILL with Daniel in the front seat.

FOLLOW Hot Rod up and over a roadway leading around the

perimeter of Autobot City which becomes visible the instant

Hot Rod clears the rim of a hill. As they travel, we SHOULD

also be getting a sense of what Autobot City is all about.

(DESIGN NOTE: Autobot City looks like a federal energy

project gone mad. Here, the Autobots are trying to exploit

every known means of getting energy. The mountain is covered

with solar panels, windmills spin in the valley, oil derricks

pump, and not far away a hydroelectric dam catches millions

of volts. Near all of these various things are energon

compressors, which turn the raw energy into energon cubes. IN

THE BACKGROUND of these scenes, we should see various panel

truck-type Autobots cruise up in auto mode to stacks of this

energon, convert to humanoid mode, load up their vans, then

convert to Auto mode again and drive the Energon into Autobot

City. In short, it should be clear that the purpose of

Autobot City is to harvest energy. All the while, Hot Rod and

Daniel are riding recklessly out from the Autobot City and up

into neighboring hills for an overview of the -

which resides within the "bowl" created by the City structure

and natural surroundings.
Hey!   Let me out.

Why settle for a peek when you can see

          everything from Lookout Mountain?

But we're not supposed to go beyond City

          limits!
Chromo-Chicken!

KUP - a grizzled, "old Soldier" of an Autobot - is directing

the positioning of a large metal road barricade. Hot Rod

barrels through a sign which reads: "STOP -THIS AREA OFF

LIMITS", almost knocking Kup over in dust and wind

disgustedly watches Hot Rod drive up the

          mountain.

(to sound like swearing)

          Cam bustin', turbo revvin' young punk.

heading.subject: MOUNTAIN ABOVE AUTOBOT CITY- LOOKOUT POINT
heading.raw_text: MOUNTAIN ABOVE AUTOBOT CITY- LOOKOUT POINT

segments.content:
Hot Rod arrives at a viewing platform carved in mountainside

and TRANSFORMS back to humanoid mode. Daniel rushes to a set

of PUBLIC VIEWING BINOCULARS and peers into them.

This is it! Now take a squint through

          those babies.

Hot Rod, look! There's a hole in the

          shuttle!
What!?

heading.subject: LAR MATTE
heading.raw_text: DANIEL'S P.O.V - BINOCULAR MATTE - THE SHUTTLE

segments.content:
The hole Megatron blasted in order to get into the shuttle

mars the otherwise perfect exterior of the ship.

heading.subject: DANIEL AND HOT ROD
heading.raw_text: ANGLE ON DANIEL AND HOT ROD

segments.content:
Hot Rod looks up and a pair of futuristic binoculars pop out

of his eyes.

Hot Rod's vision, now, infinitely better than human vision,

spots something truly disturbing -- -- Starscream, and

several Constructicons inside the ship!
Decepticons!
Drawing his gun, he starts FIRING on the shuttle.
This is for Ironhide.    As so's this!
Rays streak through the hole searing...
He ducks away from the door.
I'm hit!

Standing behind a pair of Decepticons who pilot the shuttle,

he turns to see...
Firing out of the hole.
He's furious.
You imbecile, our cover is blown!
It was your stupid strategy!

Kup and the Autobot Construction Crew watch Hot Rod shooting

at the shuttle.

What's that darn fool doing? Hound looks

          up and points.
Decepticons!

Suddenly it cracks open, and Decepticons shoot out of the

wreckage like toys from a pinata.
In mid-air

(shouting to forces)

             Attack!

                 (he looks down and fires)

Hot Rod pulls Daniel back as Megatron's BLAST SHEARS OFF the

VIEWING PLATFORM which crumbles and falls down the steep

mountain!

Hang on!

Putting Daniel under one arm, he pivots and kicks up at...

...Hook and Scavenger who are descending on him in humanoid

mode... ...causing them both to crash against the

mountainside which starts a... ...landslide which Hot Rod

"rides" down the slope, pursued by... ... Decepticon FIRE.
WHoooooooaaah

heading.subject: BOTTOM OF MOUNTAIN SLOPE
heading.raw_text: ANGLE ON BOTTOM OF MOUNTAIN SLOPE - BLITZWING

segments.content:
Blitzwing flies down in jet mode, transforms to robot mode,

looks up at the "slide riding" Hot Rod and Daniel, transforms

to tank mode and takes aim.

(amused)

             Come on down, Autobrat!

as Hot Rod tumbles, he covers Daniel with his arms and tries

unsuccessfully to slow his fall.
Yiiiiiiiiii!
about to fire, when...

heading.subject: ...Kup's arm descends into SHOT, spinning Blitzwing's turret
heading.raw_text: ...Kup's arm descends into SHOT, spinning Blitzwing's turret

segments.content: around. Blitzwing's blast, scorches...
who is flying nearby.

transforms to robot mode and turns as...

          Kup comes flying, feet first, into

          Blitzwing knocking him off the mountain

          ledge.

FOLLOW Kup as he lands in front of Hot Rod, who is just

coming to a stop at the bottom with Daniel.
Not bad for an old timer!

(gruffly)

          Old timer?! That's something you'll

          never be if you don't get back to the

          city. You know what we used to do with

          cocky, insubordinate upstarts?

(interrupting)

          Save it.

transforming into jet mode, fires on them

          with laser bursts which...

... chew up the ground beside them.
with Daniel race toward Autobot City, transforming into

heading.subject: vehicle mode as shots gouge the terrain around them.
heading.raw_text: vehicle mode as shots gouge the terrain around them.

heading.subject: PERCEPTOR IN MICROSCOPE MODE ON "BATTLEMENT" OF AUTOBOT CITY
heading.raw_text: PERCEPTOR IN MICROSCOPE MODE ON "BATTLEMENT" OF AUTOBOT CITY

segments.content: he watches...

Megatron, Insecticons, Constructicons, and other Decepticon

forces attack the city from the sky and ground.

transforms to humanoid and runs

          toward...... ... Three new Autobots,

          ARCEE, a lovely female Autobot of about

          Hot Rod's age, SPRINGER, a very muscular

          and bantering "Indiana Jones" type

          Autobot and ULTRA MAGNUS, the large and

          soldierly City Commander.

Ultra Magnus.....a cursory evaluation of

          Decepticon capability indicates a

          distinct tactical deficit!
In other words, Perceptor...

(translating)

          We're outnumbered!

He turns and FIRES from his hip.
Zooms in to strafe as...
...Explodes on his wing tip.
as Decepticon BOMBS AND LASER FIRE pour in on the City.
Springer, Arcee, transform Autobot City!

heading.subject: LOOKING DOWN ON COURTYARD
heading.raw_text: HIGH ANGLE - LOOKING DOWN ON COURTYARD - TRACKING SPRINGER

segments.content: Pathetic fools!

TRANSFORMS and hovers in robot mode,

          firing all around them as they...

..dive for the switch and pull it down.

There's no escape...Uuuuh! Just then, the

          floor of the courtyard STARTS

          TRANSFORMING - - the center line of the

          floor snaps shut like the halves of a

          Starscream's foot.
Agggggggh!     My foot!

as they make it through an archway which TRANSFORMS INTO A

STEEL SHIELD as they run through

heading.subject: ON STARSCREAM
heading.raw_text: ON STARSCREAM - HIS FOOT STILL CAUGHT IN "CLAM" OF COURTYARD

segments.content:
He struggles to get free before he is crunched by the still

horn" like projection from his wrist and pulls his boot

COMPLETELY and more armored shielding SLIDES INTO PLACE TO

away as the city continues to transform to a fortress below.

The towers and buildings of the city, picot and retract.. ...

withdrawing like periscopes, turning and vanishing into

steel shield coverings.

as he FLIES OVER SCENE, BLASTING this way

          and that, shouting
Breach their defenses!

who are trailing Megatron, attack the

          fast CLOSING CITY, trying to GNAW AND

          DEVOUR their way through the PORTS and

(Chewing on jamb of doorway

          Delicious, eh Shrapnel?

(CHEWING on draw-bridge to

                  City)

             A little heavy on the electrons.

             Electrons.

as Kup and Hot Rod are racing down mountain toward the

transforming city's drawbridge.
The Insecticons are in our way.

Wrong!   They're our way in!   Yaaaaaaay-

             hah!

Hot Rod speeds up, passes Kup and... ...

... hurtle across the open space between Kickback and the

As Shrapnel looks up and reacts... ...Kup

             SAILING OT OVER OPEN SPACE between

transforms, shutting down with metal

as Kup and Hot Rod roll in and TRANSFORM where Ultra Magnus

is waiting for them with Perceptor.   Other Autobots are

Daniel looks on in awe.

(sternly)

          You can explain your security violation

I don't have to explain my so called

          violation to you or anyone...

(tugs him along roughly)

Kup moves OFF with Hot Rod and Daniel.

heading.subject: NEST" LOOKOUT TOWER
heading.raw_text: BLASTER ON FORTIFIED " CROWS NEST" LOOKOUT TOWER

segments.content:
The "Crows Nest" has windows all around and Blaster's seat

FIRING at the windows of the Crows Nest but the bursts

explode harmlessly against the glass

Lookout and shout! Yow! Explosions rock

          and tilts to see...

Chewing on armor plating at the lower edge of the fortified,

transformed city.
activates turret type LASER CANNON

Gonna lay some slugs on those overweight

              (FIRES Laser Cannon)

LASER BLAST cooks out and we FOLLOW IT

          OFF SCREEN to...

as a Laser BLAST hurls Bombshell up and

Perceptor joins him.

(joyful at his direct hit)

          Heavy and...

rise and expand into space

Soundwave!     Jam that transmission.

as they transform and attack the crows

as he starts PILE DRIVER MOTION on Crows

as he CRACKS THROUGH GLASS and he and

as he spews out CASSETTES which TRANSFORM

as Cubbie takes him down by the foot,

as he SNAPS at Ratbat who screams and

as Bolts swats Frenzy into Stinger who JABS Stinger into

heading.subject: PRIME'S CHARGE:     A SERIES OF SHOTS
heading.raw_text: PRIME'S CHARGE:     A SERIES OF SHOTS

heading.subject: PRIME'S CHARGE
heading.raw_text: PRIME'S CHARGE - HEROIC BATTLE THEME SONG

segments.content:
Optimus Prime leader and hero of the Autobots charges into

certain doom. As he battles his way through the Decepticons,

and

Whew!!!

Yep, I thought we'd had it that time for

crushing the area between Hot Rod and

Unicron?!    Who's Unicron?

A planet six times the size of this one

So that's the monster's name.

I wonder if there's any connection

Suddenly, a Quintesson Guard roars in...

That one!

Spare me this mockery of justice.
I repeat, guilty...or innocent.
Guilty!!

Jury's faces rotate to fifth expression - a DEATH'S HEAD ON

GRANIX   {NOTE: Yet another, final, reference to Kranix as

heading.raw_text: SPRINGER AND PERCEPTOR AT OPEN DOOR

as he straps on TOOL BELT

Can I help, too?

as she steps forward with a smile, a

I think Daniel can make himself useful

Wow! Dad's exo-suit. He told me about

Here, try it on.

She starts helping him into the exo-suit.

as he gets inside the "suit" which fits

          over his body like a grid-work metal

Just think about what you want to do

brows knitted, thinking.

Don't fight it Dan-O.

locations: THE GATE TO THE QUINTESSON PALACE
heading.raw_text: EXT.   THE GATE TO THE QUINTESSON PALACE

segments.content:
At first, we see only the face of a sinister Quintesson

gatekeeper, backed up by heavily armed Sharkticons.
Greetings, noble strangers.

They stand at the gate, looking more like kids showing up at

your door wondering if you can come out and play, than like

serious robots on a serious mission.

Yes, me, Grimlock, noble! Me, Grimlock

           search for friends.
The Quintesson, showing his friendly face, smiles.
And who might they be?
Autobots.    Hot Rod and Kup.

(feigning recognition)

           Oh yes. A young one and an old one.
Yes.   You know friends.   Where are they?
They went down that path. He points to...

It probably isn't lined with primroses,

           but it should be.

GRIMLOCK You good friend to Grimlock.    I

           reward you, sometime.

With that, the four Dinobots head towards the "primrose

path."
His head rotates and he smiles a sinister, evil smile.

Galvatron stands upon the demonic planet, in an extremely

contorted position.
Why do you torture me?!

We have no idea where this godly voice is coming from, but

this place sure is spooky.
You have failed.
No, Unicron. Ultra Magnus is dead.
Then where is the matrix?
Destroyed, with him.

The matrix can not be destroyed.

              (pause)

          And Ultra Magnus lives on the planet of

          Junk. Stalk him. Cut him open! And

          bring the matrix to me.

They step along the primrose path, not noticing as sinister

things start to happen all around them.

Argh!

Me, Grimlock think trees here are cheap

UNICRON whom we see turn to take a swat at it through glass

canopy

as it pulls up beside Hot Rod's Cruiser so they are both in a

line.....The Dinobots behind both ships ...all diving toward

Unicron's nose

heading.raw_text: INT. JUNKION SHIP - WRECK-GAR AT CONTROLS

segments.content:
As Wreck-Gar also has joystick shoved down and watches

Unicron's face loom closer, closer, closer

heading.subject: CRUISER, JUNKION SHIP AND DINOBOTS IN FORMATION
heading.raw_text: LONG SHOT- CRUISER, JUNKION SHIP AND DINOBOTS IN FORMATION

segments.content:
as Unicron smiles and cups both hands together, preparing to

catch the lot of them as soon as they get within reach

Galvatron, the matrix hanging around his

          neck. Transforms to Cannon and fires up

          at... ... A bright panel on Unicron's

          chest...

He hits the panel and lights and sparks fly out, causing the

gigantic robot to flicker momentarily.

The monster lets out a ROAR! Then, reaches down, picks up

Galvatron and drops him into his mouth like a raisin.

He drops into the deep pit of Unicron's mouth, narrowly

avoiding both a torrent of fire, and his sharp, crushing

teeth.

heading.raw_text: EXT. THE SPACE BATTLE - SAME TIME

segments.content:
As they Junkion cruiser comes close, Unicron lets out a burst

of fire... ... Flames lick the ship, but when the fire

subsides, nothing has happened.

Patented enamel resists fire, rain and

             corrosion. Five year warranty,

             satisfaction guaranteed.

Or your money back!

The ship fires back, dumping rays into... ... Unicron's face,

but not really doing any damage.

Unicron grabs the Junkion cruiser with both of it's hands

and...
... tears it in half.

Unshakable, unbreakable, unbeatable. And

             for a limited time we include...

As Ultra Magnus, Perceptor and the others watch in

amazement...
Free bonus surprise!
Free bonus surprise!

welding things... ...screwing things together... ... and

kicking control panels to make them work...

Both halves of the Junkion ship act as independent space

ships.
Most unscientific, but... effective.
As the Quintesson ship shoots toward Unicron's face.

Is suddenly struck by a ray from

          Unicron's eye, and half of it is knocked

          off.
Lights go off, and the Autobots are thrown around like toys.
They are heading right to Unicron's eye.

heading.subject: UNICRON AND THE CRUISER
heading.raw_text: ANGLE ON UNICRON AND THE CRUISER

segments.content:
Unicron swipes at the cruiser, but misses. The Cruiser

crashes right through Unicron's eye like a corkscrew!
Graaaaaaaaaaa!

The cruiser rips through the eye socket and smashes through

several electrical membranes that are, in fact, Unicron's

brain.

As the ship tumbles through, it dumps off the various

Autobots like rubbish and disintegrates.

He tumbles out of the rubbish and down a deep pit (which we

can assume is a robotic sinus or something)

Kup, Springer, Daniel and Arcee are scattered about the floor

in the giant, flickering chamber.
Where's Hot Rod?
Sees something in the distance.

I don't know, but I hope they didn't get

             him.

Are dozens of hovering Robots that look like floating bear

traps, snapping their jaws as they drift slowly towards the

Autobots.
Debugoids!

Quick!   This way.

They run into a long, cave-like chamber which looks like the

central nervous system or something.

Hot Rod drops through the darkness and lands in a pile of

miscellaneous junk.
He slowly gets up and looks around the chamber.

Pan as Hot Rod looks over various different bits of junk,

until he sees the glowing shape of the Autobot Matrix

apparently suspended in mid air.

The Autobot Matrix!

Then, suddenly two red, burning eyes light up above the

matrix, and we see the hideous form of Galvatron.

It will do you no good, Autobot.   It

             cannot be opened.
He stands up and walks towards Galvatron.
Not by a Decepticon.

heading.subject: HOT ROD AND GALVATRON
heading.raw_text: ANGLE ON HOT ROD AND GALVATRON

segments.content: Hot Rod steps towards Galvatron.

It is strange that we should find

          ourselves as allies...

Suddenly, his body is violently twisted,

          and his arms are almost broken off.
Uhhhh...

Destroy him, or feel yourself torn from

          limb to limb.
Of course, my master!

heading.subject: GALVATRON AND HOT ROD
heading.raw_text: ANGLE ON GALVATRON AND HOT ROD

heading.subject: Galvatron takes a shot at Hot Rod. ... Hot Rod dives away, as
heading.raw_text: Galvatron takes a shot at Hot Rod. ... Hot Rod dives away, as

segments.content: electricity seems to flash everywhere.
He peers into the gloom.
Hot Rod is nowhere to be seen amidst all of the junk.
Weapon drawn.

Puny Autobot, you lack even Prime's

          courage. There is no response.

Unicron now stands atop Cybertron,

          fighting the various ships that swarm

          around him like bees. ... Rays streak

          from his one good eye. ...

His hands smash fighters... ... Fire

          shoots from his mouth.

Now reaching Unicron's butt, start

          kicking.
Me Grimlock kick Butt.

Suddenly; he looks down, sending down a searing blast of

fire.
They transform to robot mode and fly away.
Me, Grimlock, need new strategy.

locations: THE CORRIDOR IN UNICRON -- SAME TIME
heading.raw_text: INT. THE CORRIDOR IN UNICRON -- SAME TIME

segments.content:
Kup, Arcee, Springer and Daniel dash down the corridor.

Suddenly, Daniel's foot is caught in a maze of wiring.
Not noticing, they keep running.
He tries to pull his foot out. No luck. Then, he looks up.
The Robotic Antibodies are drawing very close to him.
He looks o.s. towards the others.
Help...

They turn around and see Daniel about to be munched by the

antibodies.
Daniel!

heading.subject: SPRINGER, KUP AND ARCEE
heading.raw_text: ANGLE ON SPRINGER, KUP AND ARCEE

segments.content: They dash down the corridor firing on...

heading.subject: Their shots hit some, knocking them to scrap, but there are
heading.raw_text: Their shots hit some, knocking them to scrap, but there are

segments.content: so many of them, that they can't hold back the tide as it...

Daniel, unscathed by the things, which hover over his head,

munching their way towards the Autobots, gets his foot free.
I'm okay.    They don't even see me.

It looks like Custer's last stand as they are surrounded by

the vicious antibodies.

They must not programmed to catch flesh

           creatures.
Us, on the other hand...

Daniel... Try to find help! Arcee

           fires...
Misses the Antibodies, but strikes a large tube.

When it is hit, it pours a torrent of liquid which... ...

Goes over the swarm of Antibodies, but hits Daniel... ...

Carrying him away in a flood of glowing liquid.
He shouts as he finds himself in a river of flowing goo.

Daniel    rips through what seem to be endless caves on the

torrent    of liquid, until he is dumped down a high waterfall

into...    .... A glowing lake. ... He stays under for a

moment,    and then bobs up to see...

This is the central processing area for

             Unicron's "food" and "energy." A long

             conveyer belt drops junk into a clear,

             bubbling vat, where it is separated into

             raw material and energy. The energy,

             which comes out in raw form, goes into a

             machine and is crunched into energon

             cubes, while the solid material, is

             separated into it's component metals and

             plastics, formed into ingots and sent

             elsewhere in an assembly line fashion.
watches this with awe until he sees...

... Several Decepticon troopers hanging from cables like

shirts at a dry cleaners are dropped into the bubbling vat,

and in moments converted to nothing... ... Then, Cliffjumper

and Jazz roll out of the line...

He dashes to the shores of the glowing

             lake...

Cliffjumper! Jazz!

And then Spike comes rolling down, followed by Bumblebee!
Bumblebee!     Dad!

They look down, but can't move because they are held by

massive pincers.

Shut off the control, Daniel. Daniel

             looks around.

Then, he sees.
..     which controls the whole thing.
He runs up a catwalk towards it....
He reaches the flickering panel.

What do I do? It doesn't have any

          buttons or anything.
He looks down.
Shoot it, Son.
But I don't have a gun.
Use your exo-suit.

He looks down at his hand and concentrates as hard as he can.

Then, a spark comes out. It grows longer.
Spike and the Autobots are about to go in.
Hurry!
Starts frying the command console!
It keeps moving. Then, Cliffjumper is dropped in!

He looks back, and to his horror sees Jazz, Bumblebee and his

father about to be dropped in. He keeps firing. The panel

starts exploding!
I can't stop it!
Jazz drops in, then Bumblebee, then Spike.
turns around and sees this.

Dad!

There is no answer. Play the moment. Then...
Son.

It is empty. The Autobots and Spike sit at the bottom,

smoking but alright.
You did it!

locations: THE DARK CAVERN WITH GALVATRON AND HOT ROD
heading.raw_text: INT.   THE DARK CAVERN WITH GALVATRON AND HOT ROD

segments.content:
Galvatron, the Matrix at his neck, stalks around the room.

Looking everywhere for Hot Rod.

Come out, Autobot. We all must die

           sometime.

Suddenly, shockingly, Hot Rod jumps out of the floor and

grabs Galvatron, sinking his fist into the Decepticon's face.
stumbles backward.

heading.subject: GALVATRON AND HOT ROD
heading.raw_text: ANGLE ON GALVATRON AND HOT ROD

segments.content:
Galvatron jumps at Hot Rod... ...   Hot Rod transforms to a

car and races away...
He transforms to cannon mode and fires... ... Hot Rod

heading.subject: humanoid mode and the shot goes through his
heading.raw_text: transforms to humanoid mode and the shot goes through his

segments.content: legs. ...   Then, he fires back at Galvatron... ...

Hitting him as he transforms back to humanoid mode and

angering him. .Raises his gun, then lowers it.

No, I will crush you with bare hands. Hot

          Rod transforms back to car and tries to

          race away... ... Galvatron jumps after

          him and catches him... ... Hot Rod,

          nearly pinned by Galvatron transforms to

          humanoid mode.

... Galvatron wrestles him to his back.. ... The Adolescent

Robot tries to fight back, but the other is stronger. ...

Galvatron puts his hands around Hot Rod's neck and starts

squeezing. ... We hear the crunching of metal.

First Prime, then Ultra Magnus and now

          you. It is a pity Autobots die so easily

          or I might have a sense of satisfaction

          now. Hot Rod desperately gasps and pulls

          at Galvatron's hands...

Unicron shoots down more Decepticons with his remaining eye,

while he crushes the Junkion ship.

The walls crush in.    The Junkions and the Autobots are   being

smashed together.
Ashes to ashes. Junk to junk.
Gasps.
Die!

On Hot Rod, his hands, nearly dead,

          spring to life for a moment and grasp the

          Matrix which hangs from Galvatron's

          chest.
Suddenly, it lights up.

A miraculous transformation takes place.

          ... Hot Rod begins to grow at an

          alarming rate. ... Age shows on his

          face. ... He is stronger and wiser.
Arise, Rodimus Prime.
Optimus!
He fires at Hot Rod as...
Nooooooo!

heading.subject: ... Hot Rod gets up. ...    The shot doesn't even dent him.
heading.raw_text: ... Hot Rod gets up. ...    The shot doesn't even dent him.

segments.content:
This is the end of the road, Galvatron.

          With that, he picks up the Decepticon and

          throws him through...
... Unicron's side...

Hot Rod, bathed in the glow of the matrix. Sticks his hand

in the way we saw Galvatron and Ultra Magnus try earlier.

There is no shock. Then, like pulling the pin on a hand

grenade, he unleashes the spiritual equivalent of a bomb!

heading.subject: ASSORTED SHOTS
heading.raw_text: ASSORTED SHOTS -   INVASION OF THE MATRIX

segments.content:
The matrix rips through Unicron's body, blowing up wires

causing floods and generally causing havoc.

Unicron suddenly lets out a scream and lets go of the Junkion

ship, sending it hurtling.
It tumbles through space.
Suddenly,    he starts tearing into his body.

Unicron writhes in space, tearing himself apart, ripping off

a leg, and sending out sparks like a roman candle.

locations: THE CORRIDOR WHERE KUP ET.AL ARE TRAPPED
heading.raw_text: INT. THE CORRIDOR WHERE KUP ET.AL ARE TRAPPED

segments.content:
They are overrun by the antibodies. One takes a whopper bite

out of Springer's chest.

I'm almost out of energy. Suddenly, he

             looks up and sees one of the creatures

             explode above
Then another explodes, then another.

heading.subject: A WALL OF ANTIBODIES
heading.raw_text: SPRINGER'S POV - A WALL OF ANTIBODIES

segments.content:
Suddenly, every antibody in the wall begins exploding, and

through the carnage, we see Bumblebee, Spike, Daniel,

Cliffjumper and Jazz.

The last of the antibodies is blown away, and Kup, Arcee and

Springer sit up amidst a pile of antibody bodies.
That's what I call the nick of time.

Suddenly, an entire wall vanishes as Unicron's hand tears at

things.
Let's burn rubber!
They transform. The humans jump in.

They race up the tunnel, one step ahead    of Unicron's hand

which shoots after them, pulling apart    what we know must be

pieces of his brain... Then, they reach    what seems like a

dead end. In fact, it is the back side     of Unicron's good

eye. The hand comes in after them!

An unbelievably fast and powerful robot races towards the

Autobots. When it gets there, we realize that it is Rodimus

Prime.
I knew you had potential, lad!

Autobots, transform and roll out. Rodimus

          Prime transforms into truck mode as the

          other Autobots also transform. Daniel

          and Spike jump into him. Then, in a

          continuous line, he shoots off, the other

          Autobots racing behind him.

Rodimus Prime shoots out the second eye...    Followed by the

others.

heading.subject: uselessly as the Autobot essence
heading.raw_text: An arm and a leg dangle uselessly as the Autobot essence

segments.content:
spreads throughout the body, blowing circuits. Suddenly,

Unicron lets out a loud agonized ROAR. SPARKS seem to shoot

out of every part of his body. Then, he spins in space like

some kind of a fireworks display, shooting off sparks. And

then...
We get the big visual explosion.

Unicron's head orbits Cybertron. PAN to Cybertron where and

PUSH IN on Rodimus Prime, Arcee, Kup, Springer, Ultra Magnus,

Wreck-Gar, Daniel, Perceptor, Blaster and Spike watch

construction being done on Cybertron below.

Let this mark the end of the Cybertronian

          wars as we move forward to a new age of

          peace and happiness....
Until all are one!
